mapper.select:
select count(*) from
PRODUCT PRODUCT_NAME
left join PRODUCT on PRODUCT.product_name_no = PRODUCT_NAME.product_name_no
where
PRODUCT.PRODUCTNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
PRODUCT.PRODUCTID like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NAME_NO like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select p.*,pn.product_name_instockdate from product p,product_name pn where p.product_name_no=pn.product_name_no order by p.product_name_no desc) tt) where (rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum})

select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select PRODUCT.*,PRODUCT_NAME.product_name_instockdate from PRODUCT,PRODUCT_NAME where PRODUCT.product_name_no=PRODUCT_NAME.product_name_no and
PRODUCT.PRODUCTNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
PRODUCT.PRODUCTID like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NAME_NO like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NAME_NO desc) tt) where (rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum})
select * from PRODUCT join PRODUCT_NAME on PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NAME_NO = PRODUCT_NAME.PRODUCT_NAME_NO

select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from product_name left join product on product.product_name_no = product_name.product_name_no inner join product_category on product_name.product_category_no=product_category.product_category order by product_name.product_name_no desc) tt) where (rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum})

select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from product_name left join product on product.product_name_no = product_name.product_name_no inner join product_category on product_name.product_category_no=product_category.product_category where
PRODUCT.PRODUCTNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
PRODUCT.PRODUCTID like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NAME_NO like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by product_name.product_name_no desc) tt) where (rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum})

select * from product_name left join product on product.product_name_no = product_name.product_name_no inner join product_category on product_name.product_category_no=product_category.product_category where product_name.product_name_no=#{product_name_no}
mapper.update: update PRODUCT_NAME set PRODUCT_SALESMOUNT=#{product_salesMount} where PRODUCT_NAME_NO=#{product_name_no}

update product_name set product_category_no=#{product_category_no}, product_name_title=#{product_name_title}, product_name_detail=#{product_name_detail}, product_name_price=#{product_name_price}, product_name_instockdate=#{product_name_instockdate}, product_name_image=#{product_name_image}, product_onstore=#{product_onstore} where product_name_no=#{product_name_no}
mapper.select:
select * from product inner join product_name on product.product_name_no = product_name.product_name_no inner join product_category on product_name.product_category_no=product_category.product_category where product_onstore='YES'
and product_category.product_category_name=#{product_category_name}
and
PRODUCT.PRODUCTNAME like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' PRODUCT_NAME.PRODUCT_NAME_TITLE like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
ORDER BY
PRODUCT.PRODUCTNAME PRODUCT.PRODUCT_REGISTERDATE PRODUCT.UNITCOST PRODUCT.PRODUCT_REGISTERDATE
DESC ASC
mapper.update: update product_name set product_hit=product_hit+1 where product_name_no=#{product_name_no}
mapper.select: select SEQ from LIKETABLE where USERID=#{USERID} and PRODUCT_NO=#{PRODUCT_NO}
